Changes For 1.0.5
[LittleDog Historic Changes]

Changes

This section describes all API and user-visible changes between LittleDog release 1.0.4 and LittleDog release 1.0.5.

LittleDog_User_Guide

  • The kinematic joint offsets table (Table 1., pg 31) has been updated to reflect changes to the new LittleDog shell.

LittleDog

  • The littledog_hardware.cfg configuration file has been updated with new calibration parameters in an effort to improve kinematic accuracy with the new LittleDog shell.
  • The new joint offsets (see new .pdf document above) were incorporated in the software so that LittleDog::getJointOffset() returns the same values as are documented.
